data.title: KPROJ Capital Increase Prospectus
data.meta_description: KPROJ Capital Increase Prospectus - Free ebook download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read book online for free. Kuwait Projects Company is offering 452,748,662 new shares through a rights issue to existing shareholders at a price of KD 0.210 per share. The rights offering period will be from June 27 to July 17, 2019. Existing shareholders will receive the right to subscribe for 293 new shares for every 1,000 existing shares held. The proceeds will be used for general corporate purposes. Kamco Investment Company is the issuing advisor and subscription agent for the rights offering.
